step1.commands: cd 1.0_ProdMinBias+ProdMinBias+DIGIPROD1+RECOPROD1; cmsDriver.py MinBias_8TeV_pythia8_TuneCUETP8M1_cff --conditions auto:run1_mc -n 10 --eventcontent RAWSIM --relval 9000,300 -s GEN,SIM --datatier GEN-SIM --beamspot Realistic8TeVCollision --fileout file:step1.root > step1_ProdMinBias+ProdMinBias+DIGIPROD1+RECOPROD1.log 2>&1;

step2.commands: cd 1.0_ProdMinBias+ProdMinBias+DIGIPROD1+RECOPROD1; cmsDriver.py step2 --datatier GEN-SIM-RAW --conditions auto:run1_mc -s DIGI,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:@fake --eventcontent RAWSIM -n 100 --filein file:step1.root --fileout file:step2.root > step2_ProdMinBias+ProdMinBias+DIGIPROD1+RECOPROD1.log 2>&1;

step3.commands: cd 1.0_ProdMinBias+ProdMinBias+DIGIPROD1+RECOPROD1; cmsDriver.py step3 --datatier GEN-SIM-RECO,AODSIM --conditions auto:run1_mc -s RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,EI --eventcontent RECOSIM,AODSIM -n 100 --filein file:step2.root --fileout file:step3.root > step3_ProdMinBias+ProdMinBias+DIGIPROD1+RECOPROD1.log 2>&1;
